summary: Fixes the transparency bug on the steel helmet (regular and horned version). Apparently this is only needed for ATI card users who have adaptive AA enabled.
descriptionHtml:
EDIT: It seems this bug only applies to ATI users who have adaptive AA enabled. If you don\'t have this bug, no need to download (obviously).

Fixes the transparency bug on the steel helmet (regular and horned version). When wearing the helmet you can see the characters hair/head and the helmet is partially transparent. This looks ugly. Couldn\'t find a fix for it so I made one.

Installation:

Put the meshes folder from the archive into your Skyrim\\Data folder.
author: Phitt
